main_tasks:
• Innovate: Lead the development of cutting-edge ad SDKs that can innovate the industry with our top-notch engineering team members.
• Collaborate: Work with infra and ML teams to maximize the impact of SDKs.
• Make Impact: Closely work with our product managers and biz dev teams to insert our SDK to partner companies.
requirements:
• Proven track record of success in leading SDK development in either Android or iOS.
• Outstanding problem-solving skills with proper data structures and algorithms.
• Excellent software development skills at least in one programming language.
jd:
MOLOCO seeks exceptional SDK Software Engineers to join us in building a state-of-the-art mobile advertising platform. You will be building a world-class infrastructure that combines machine learning and big data to help companies supercharge their growth. Many leading service owners and marketers worldwide already benefit from MOLOCO’s innovative technology to scale performance quickly and efficiently through battle-tested prediction models.

As a company founded by Software Engineers, we understand the value of a strong engineering team and strive to hire only the best talent. You will be challenged to solve real-world problems with top-notch colleagues. Check out our case study published by Google https://cloud.google.com/customers/moloco/.


주요업무
• Innovate: Lead the development of cutting-edge ad SDKs that can innovate the industry with our top-notch engineering team members.
• Collaborate: Work with infra and ML teams to maximize the impact of SDKs.
• Make Impact: Closely work with our product managers and biz dev teams to insert our SDK to partner companies.

자격요건
• Proven track record of success in leading SDK development in either Android or iOS.
• Outstanding problem-solving skills with proper data structures and algorithms.
• Excellent software development skills at least in one programming language.

우대사항
• Fluent in English (both verbal and written)
• Experience in Cloud/Big Data platforms (e.g., AWS, GCE, Dataflow, Spark, etc.)
• Experience in the digital advertising technology business

혜택 및 복지
• 입사 시 주식연계형 보상(RSU) 지급
• 완전 자율출퇴근제
• 무제한 휴가
• 점심비용 매일 최대 25,000원 상당 지원
• 자기계발비, 체력단련비, 주중교통비 별도지원
